getNaturalCoordinates(RayIntersection) - Method in class cip.render.raytrace.geometry.AGeometry
This is a pseudo-natural mapping that just projects the xy (plan) object coordinates to be the "natural coordinates", and creates the axis aligned and scaled displacement vectors for U and V.
getNaturalCoordinates(RayIntersection) - Method in class cip.render.raytrace.geometry.Cone
The natural mapping for a sphere is U equal to degrees longitude measured counter-clockwise (looking down) starting at the +i axis being 0 degree (+j = 90 degree, -i = 180 degree, and -j = 270 degree).
getNaturalCoordinates(RayIntersection) - Method in class cip.render.raytrace.geometry.Cylinder
The natural mapping for a sphere is U equal to degrees longitude measured counter-clockwise (looking down) starting at the +i axis being 0 degree (+j = 90 degree, -i = 180 degree, and -j = 270 degree).
getNaturalCoordinates(RayIntersection) - Method in class cip.render.raytrace.geometry.Paraboloid
The natural mapping for a paraboloid is U equal to degrees longitude measured counter-clockwise (looking down) starting at the +i axis being 0 degree (+j = 90 degree, -i = 180 degree, and -j = 270 degree).
getNaturalCoordinates(RayIntersection) - Method in class cip.render.raytrace.geometry.Sphere
The natural mapping for a sphere is U equal to degrees longitude measured counter-clockwise (looking down) starting at the +i axis being 0 degree (+j = 90 degree, -i = 180 degree, and -j = 270 degree).

GOING_INTO - Static variable in class cip.render.util3d.Plane3fIntersection
The origin of the ray is outside of (a positive distance from) the plane, and the intersection is for the ray going into the plane.
GOING_INTO - Static variable in class cip.render.util3d.Quadric3fIntersection
The first intersection (at distance m_fDist1) is going into the quadric.
GOING_OUT_OF - Static variable in class cip.render.util3d.Plane3fIntersection
The origin of the ray is inside of (a negative distance from) the plane, and the intersection is for the ray going out of the plane.
GOING_OUT_OF - Static variable in class cip.render.util3d.Quadric3fIntersection
The second intersection (at distance m_fDist2) is going out of the quadric.
